description:
## SPARQL engine action part III
###This mapping shows how to configure the [SPARQL Engine action](https://github.com/helio-ecosystem/helio-action-sparql-engine). If the input data is not expressed in `TURTLE` the key `data-format`must be used to specify the data's serialization, possible values are: turtle, ttl, json-ld, json-ld-11, rdf/xml, n-triples, nt, n3. The `output-format` can be setup for changing the query results format. For SELECT queries possible values are: json (default), csv, tsv, and xml. For ASK queries possible values are json or xml (csv and tsv are not supported). For DESCRIBE and CONSTRUCT queries possible values are turtle (by default), ttl, json-ld, json-ld-11, rdf/xml, n-triples, nt, n3.
user_template:
<#-- RDF data -->
<#assign rdf>
[{"@id":"http://example.org/resources/alice","https://schema.org/name":[{"@value":"Alice Cooper"}]},{"@id":"http://example.org/resources/bob","https://schema.org/givenName":[{"@value":"Bob"},{"@value":"Robert"}],"https://schema.org/lastName":[{"@value":"Smith"}]},{"@id":"http://example.org/resources/carol","https://schema.org/name":[{"@value":"Carol King"}],"https://schema.org/givenName":[{"@value":"Carol"}],"https://schema.org/lastName":[{"@value":"King"}]}]
</#assign>

<#-- Setting up the query and running the engine -->
<#assign config = '{"query" : "select * where {?s ?p ?o}", "data-format" : "json-ld", "output-format" : "csv" }'>
<@action type="SparqlEngine" data=rdf conf=config; result>
[=result]
</@action>
